content.text:
[@ev](@8Qee0I/DwI5DHSCi3p5fsl6FyLGArrnDz3ox9qZr5Qc=.ed25519) Has that blocking change happened recently, or am I misreading the documentation? From the source of ssb-friends I can see that the current behavior is exactly what you're both seeing, but I see some outdated documentation that suggests it may have changed?

From https://scuttlebot.io/apis/scuttlebot/block.html and https://ssbc.github.io/scuttlebot/plugins/block.html (same data?):

> Disallow connections with people flagged by the local user, and **avoid sending a feed to the users they've flag[ed]**.
